content: lion brand pattern # 654 *cchs-teddy pdf* skill level beginner lion® chenille article #530 *discontinued* a 696 yards mocha b 174 yards black for embroidery crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm polyester fiberfill for stuffing 24 length of ribbon to tie around neck worked in rounds beginning with the head some construction required to finish see tiny teddy bear 1 for a smaller version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tiny-teddy-bear
